name: Pear And Stilton Sandwiches
keywords: appetizer, bread, pear, stilton, fall, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 ripe pear, halved and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Spread each bread slice with the softened butter. Sprinkle the pear slices with the lemon juice. Place half of the pear slices in a single layer on a slice of the bread. Top with half of the crumbled cheese and a second bread slice. Repeat, using the remaining pear slices, cheese and bread.
